Posts.Content: Hi......When I was going through Radiation, I met a man who was waiting for his wife to finish treatment. He was soooooooooo confident on his cell-phone, I hsd to ask him........"Hey how do I send texts on predictive?..How do I programme my address book?.." He told me :... "Find a 10 year old kid on the street, kidnap him for 3 minutes, Sorted" LOL Jxxxxxxxxxxxx

Seriously , I use ativan and tramocet, it works sometimes, but NOT with all that noise going on. Anyone got a good shovel, a bag of lime and a big hole in the back forty??????? Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Title: Best pain management med?

Posts.Content: I had to write a factum on a case very much like this, used research from cases here in Canada. All these cases were disability/spousal support. Relevance of disability: Bracklow v. Bracklow 1999 BC Patrick v. Patrick 1993 Ont Kloos v. Kloos 1996 20 RFL Leonard v. Leonard 2002 Ont Ashworth v. Ashworth Ont These might be worth googling just for a quick outline and to give you some much needed ammunition against this Leech. I wish you well. Most Judges would not look very kindly on a spouse who abandoned his partner on diagnosis of a serious disease such as this. Jxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: metastatic breast cancer and SURVIVING AN ABUSIVE EX-HUSHAND

Posts.Content: Marijuana, if you have it legal where you are.  Works brill, no side effects and organic.  J xx
Posts.Title: Best pain management med?

Posts.Content: 3 months ago I started my 3rd battle with breast cancer, it had gone to the bones.  Onco put me on Xeloda and pemidronate.  Last Friday I went to bed to sweat it out as normal and woke up in Saturday morning in bloody agony with a broken rib.  Beginning to think this treatment isn't working that well.  Any thoughts??
Posts.Title: Broken ribs whilst asleep?

Posts.Content: Going to bog off to the beach for a couple of days and stay in my friends trailer. Got my bottle of sp4 Hawaiian Tropic. I'm taking a leopardskin micro, Turquoise heels, Huge plastic orange earrings, Loads of Bling and 3 tons of makeup. Hey gotta look the part! Trailer T(r)ASH! LOL. Jxxxxxx
Posts.Title: I'm off..

Posts.Content: Hi! Hope all goes well tomorrow, Huge HUGS Jxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Ultrasound tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hi Jakeca, I have exactly the same as you and my surgeon told me it was from the radiation, irritating the scar tissue on the breast and site of the now removed lymph nodes. During radiation I took a very severe burn, but not until the end so they didn't have to stop treatment, my rad dr. gave me a steroid cream and recommended polysporin.. it worked. Good luck. Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Radiation bad effects????

Posts.Content: I told you how I felt tonight. You are soooooooooooo special. I really thank goodness that you are here.................Huge Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: FOR ZAHALENE! You made my day!

Posts.Content: I will be thinking of you tonight. Hugs Jxx
Posts.Title: Tomorrow (tonight) is a bit tough....

Posts.Content: I was watching a Medical T.V. show yesterdays and the doctor guest on it proclaimed that the secret to finding lasting inner peace was to finish what you had started. So, I looked around my house to see things I had started but hadn't finished. And, before leaving the house this morning I finished a bottle of Merlot, a bottle of Sharrdonnay, a bodle off Baileys; halv a butle of Vocka, a pockage of Prunglies,tha mainder ov a Prozic and Valum scriptins. The res of th cheseske N A BOX OF CHOCKLITSSS. Yu Haf no idr hou fkin gud i feal.......... Peas sen dis orn two dem u fee AR in ned ov inr pis.
Posts.Title: Inner Peace.....

Posts.Content: Hi there, I was dx 2 weeks ago and my well-meaning family doc promised she would get me the best onco and arrange scans etc etc etc.  Well she did get me the best onco, but I am in for tests all this week, including a CT scan arranged by my family doc.... now, that is massive radiation (which, apparently, I am not allowed) do I go?  Thinking of calling my onco tomorrow and asking her if it is necessary.  Anyone here had anything like this going on... Like too many cooks???????  Hope you can give me some imput............. HUGE hugs J xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Content: Hey friend ... I have suicidal thoughts too. my husband is not supportive at all...Thank God she has a true friend like you!...Julia XXXXXX

Me: Hi How are you? Fiona: Hi how are you doing? Me: Well I'm feeli.............. Fiona:....I have to go, it's my hand at cards......Byeeeeeeeeeeee Me:...Sob

Posts.Title: It Was A Great Conference Call Today! :)

Posts.Content: I just had an email from a charity initing me to donate my old clothes to starving people in third world countries. I told them to F*_K Off... Anyone who my clothes fit, sure ain't starving!
Posts.Title: Charity Clothes Donation.

Posts.Content: Yes it was, after a while I got to recognize chenhearts dulcet tones, but then I mixed her up with Greta and Pammy.. Hey Nice accents all of you! I still can't wait to hear Moopster! LOL It was so nice to be able to be there sorry I had to cut and run early.. That Doppler scan was SUCH FUN! LOL Hugs to you all Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: It Was A Great Conference Call Today! :)

Posts.Content: Hi there, welcome. I didn't have a mastectomy, only a partial and lymph node removal. I was fairly comfortable after surgery but not able to do a lot due to the nerve damage... That lasted quite a long time. Thanksgiving?..I couldn't have managed that 2 weeks later, but you may have more help and support than I did. (I sure hope so) Exhaustion....?......Yes loads of it. I hope you do OK, Life DOES get back to some semblance of normal eventually. Huge hugs and best wishes to you. Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Rookie could use some advice

Posts.Content: I cannot believe that this REALLY happened! Today I was at work potting on Rosemary, Peppers, Zucchini and all sorts of other crop.......s I was carrying a 'spent' tray to the rubbish tip, when I realised summat wasn't quite right. I was still in the back of the greenhouse and I tried to re-trace my eyesight steps to see what was wrong. I GOT IT...........A Bloody great SNAKE (EWWWWWWWWW) coiled around the rubbish bin! I FREAKED!!!!!!!! backed out of the greenhouse and RACED to the till! They absolutely killed themselves with laughing when I told them what the problem was, then they both followed me out-back. IT WAS HUGE!...They both agreed that it was big......the husband thought it was a Rattler......I hid behind a trolley full of plants making whining noises. He got rid of it by using a plant-hook. I had to sit and have a cup of tea or two (Yes , typical, Tea-swilling limey) and smoke a couple of Phags. Sorry, I had to share this with you. I was just sooooooooo freaked, we don't have snakes in England, and if we do, we don't see them... Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: O.M.G.!!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: I'LL BE THERE FOR THE lasr one..............
Posts.Title: Conference Call Questions - Do you have some ready?

Posts.Content: Hey, Glad you posted this.....I work fridays so I'll have to attend the last one,,,,,,,,I have a number of requests. Silly pics returned to our pages as in G I F S......... Live VOICE CHAT in the chat rooms..........Get rid of that censor....who has taught me more rude words than I knew even existed! LOL....... everything else is cool, they run a really good and helpful site, but WE ARE NOT NAUGHTY SCHOOLKIDS who need censorship.......If it needs to be censored, we will report it! Thanks J xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Conference Call Questions - Do you have some ready?

Posts.Content: I am only just a year out of chemo and Rads..........1 year into tamoxifen.......I am working full time in a very physical job and I love every minute of it.........It is straining, but I am so fit now, I feel better than I did a few months ago.......... Hope this helps Hun.........PS......Love the new pic! Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: How long does fatigue last??

Posts.Content: LOLOL..........Yes, I wonder too,,,,,,,,Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Conference Call Questions - Do you have some ready?

Posts.Content: Paddy loses all ten fingers (thumbs) in an industrial accident and arrives in the emergency ward. The doc says..."We can do all sorts with micro-technology, laser treatment, you sure have come to the right place....We can sew your fingers back on and get them working again, just fine....Where are they?" Paddy (Irishman) says, "I don't have my fingers with me". The doc says " BeJaysus..We can't sew them back on if you don't have 'em" Paddy replies..... "How was I supposed to pick them up?????" LOLOL... Sorry, just Humour me, I'm not dangerous... Jxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Great Joke......Had to Share

Posts.Content: It's just you! Paranoid yet?... I've had a few problems too especially in the chat room, where it's a regular occurance to get booted out.. sometimes we all get booted, then it takes an age to get back in. And Yes, we would miss ya!!!!! Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Anyone Else Having Trouble On The Site?

Posts.Content: Sending positive thoughts and hugs to you (as you know, I do NOT pray)   Best wishes and thinking of you xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Looking for encouraging words..Hi it's me.......I'm back,

Posts.Content: You Daft Sod! LOLOL ROFLMAO! Thanks M! Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Back at the Ranch...

Posts.Content: Had a rotten day.  Took 3 nurses and nearly an hour to get my monthly IV going, was in agony, floods of tears and a full blown panic attack!  Then on to meet my oncologist, the cancer has spread now to my 9th rib, and he suggested joining wellspring (cancer support group) as I get way too stressed out at the hospital visits and start shaking even before we have set off.  Also the pain in my back/neck is back with a vengeance!  Thought the cyberknife had put an end to that, but nooooooooo that would be too easy.  Thoroughly hosed off.  Tash xxxx
Posts.Title: Well this is just great! NOT :(

Posts.Content: I know exactly how you feel. It hurts like hell for a while, then you just accept how shallow people are, and why friends are suddenly off your christmas card list. I lost so many "Good Friends" who were more scared of my cancer than they were fond of me. Like you say, you find out who your true friends are during this process. Go ahead.... Vent all you like. You will eventually get over the hurt and disloyalty that is on display and surround yourself with REAL people. I was totally devastated by my treatment of some of my closest friends and even relatives..but they have been replaced by other friends and relatives who really care. I wish you well. Hugs Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: I am so dissapointed in my family

Posts.Content: It reminded me of that old joke where the little boy returns from the neighbours house and asks his gran: "What do you call it when a boy sleeps on top of a girl?" His gran inhales deeply and extols to him the Birds and the bees stuff... (sex) Next day the young boy comes home and tells his gran that he asked his neighbours' Gran the same question.... She called it Bunk Beds!...And she's coming round to see you! LOL Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Ya Gotta Be "carefuL'---what you tell the Grand Kids----these days...!!!!

Posts.Content: My Mum was just great, Dad was too, but my one and only sister.......well!! I phoned my mum when I was in the middle of chemo, she put my sis on the phone (as they were having lunch there) My sis said "Hi, How are you feeling???" then before I could answer she said "Hey if I don't get back to the game NOW they're going to deal me out, great to know you're OK.Love you. Byeeeeeee" I cried for about 3 hours after that. Don't get me wrong, I love my sister and she loves me very much, but she has her own life. I guess I was just a little over-sensitive at the time... Hell No I wasn't.......Aortus was right......a self-absorbed little twit! Does suit her, sometimes. Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: I am so dissapointed in my family

Posts.Content: April 1st...............Yeah go on, I;'ve heard them all...........Hugs Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: When is Your Birthday?

Posts.Content: April 1st...............Yeah go on, I;'ve heard them all...........Hugs Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: When is Your Birthday?

Posts.Content: I took the latest Iris Johannsen book and never managed to read even one page of it!...............I was having way too much fun with my wonderful nurses and the other patients!...........sorry........I'll try to behave now...
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks: What did you do during your chemo treatments?

Posts.Content: I got it doing Chemo (Fdxtaxotare) 6 years ago, tries Lyrica and numerous other drugs... none worked.  Sorry but it seems to go on forever, not got any better after 6 years, sometimes gets worse. Sorry for the neg dx.  J xxxx
Posts.Title: Neurothopy

Posts.Content: My oncologist has deigned to see me again in 4 months. His nurse gave me a form to get a mammogram done "sometime before that appointment". The last one I had was in October last year and showed absolutely nothing wrong, even though I had a lump the size of a golf ball that was visible to the eye. Ultrasound showed it. But they said my breasts were too dense for the mammogram. Call me a wuss but that mammogram nearly did me in, and that was BEFORE I had all this surgery, chemo and radiation. I am sure that I will not be able to stand it as I am still very lumpy and VERY tender there. And it won't show anything anyway. What is the point? Can I get away with NOT doing this? Without enraging "Dr Charm School"? Any comments appreciated. Julia
Posts.Title: Do I HAVE to have a Mammogram?

Posts.Content: Hugs to you and R Xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Content: You are a STAR! No wonder we all luv u so much! Huge hugs 2 u and r XXXxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Content: I used aloe vera, I was not pink but BLACK with huge cracks that stung like all hell... Had to do my 'Teapot impression' every time I was anywhere, it hurt a lot....Good luck hun Tash xxxxx

Posts.Content: Semper Fidelis.........Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Content: Took a couple of photos, put them as a link on desktop... now I'm technologically challenged. Any help welcome. Thanks Jxxxxx

Posts.Content: Took a couple of photos, put them as a link on desktop... now I'm technologically challenged. Any help welcome. Thanks Jxxxxx
Posts.Title: How do I show a picture

Posts.Content: I just woke up...3am and he's gone........I breathed a huge sigh of relief! No More! I'm going back to MY bed now, I have to work today...Thank you again......Hugs Jxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Way to go Tasha!

Posts.Content: Your eyelashes will grow back really thick and fast with Taxol. They will be like little brushes within a couple of weeks. Mine were. I lost all bodily hair, but the eyelashes grew back so fast it was unbelievable...I hated it when they went, I looked like a PIG! Mine grew back so fast and I was delighted to be using mascara again! Hope you soon have to trim them. Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Eyelashes

Posts.Content: The wait is just terrible........You will soon be flung headlong into it with no time to think about anything apart from..." Hey, Is my arse on fire? " Then spat out the other end wondering "Whew, Man, What the hell just happened?" I hope the waiting goes fast, because it is the worst! Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: So scared, alone and need to RELAX....HELP

Posts.Content: I broke out in a spectacular display of hives about a week after my first chemo (FEC), The onco said he'd not heard of that being a side effect but I'm fairly sure it was, started on my chestickles and moved up to face and hair after 2-3 days, then it was gone. I used calamine lotion straight from the fridge, it helped a bit. Take care Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: hives

Posts.Content: Will be thinking of you both on Friday........Good luck Ladies.....Hugs Tasha :) XXXXXXXX
Posts.Title: Biopsy on Friday

Posts.Content: I visited my onco today for 6 month check up. Everything fine. Except he started banging on about a Mammo again, he said it was time, So we agreed that I'd do it before my next appointment in January. I even had the miserable Sod laughing, Blood pressure was slightly up, I told him it was because I had to see him...He laughed, and said "None Taken!" LOL......I told him I was sure he'd heard worse... Hugs all Jxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Dr Charisma-Bypass....

Posts.Content: I agree......here here!
Posts.Title: feeling bad

Posts.Content: What Aortus said plus everyone else in here. You are one in a million, you are better than this and you will be telling somebody else this in 10 years and think of me... the daft sod! Huge hugs to you Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: If I didn't have kids . . .

Posts.Content: But thanks.... we all could use a good laugh, Thanks Margo! Hugs Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: First Christmas Joke of the Season

Posts.Content: Deedee, you amaze me, here you are going through all this and STILL you care so much about others. You are a super person, you deserve the best, This is YOU time, concentrate on what is best for YOU. If you have to relocate I am sure your granddaughter will adjust.. hey they always do. Your tests will be fine, believe that. Think Positive (Yeah I have threatened to KILL the next person who says that to me LOL) Thinking of you and yours. Merry Christmas. Julia XXXX

Posts.Content: BBC news/Health.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer is Changing

Posts.Content: Hi, Again... I contacted the Canadian Cancer Society today and they are sending me out a free Prothesis kit!!!!!!!!!.. Hey I might be able to look almost normal again!, They also told me where and when to get measured up for... "the real thing"..Do they mean coke?.. I hope this free "Falsie" weighs as much as my 40D or I'll still be going round in circles, unbalanced like a demented mountain goat! LOL Or a one eared backward flying Haggis.....they exist. Huge hugs to you all.......Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Title: Need recipe for lobster and clams

Posts.Content: Garlic, tomato, onion (Spring), Basil , celery and summer savoury. Wow, I can't believe I'm being sensible........LOL
Posts.Title: Need recipe for lobster and clams

Posts.Content: YES! Savory , Savoury, Satureja Hortensis. Whatever.........Makes great flavour.. Go for it! It is wonderful stuff. Hugs Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Need recipe for lobster and clams

Posts.Content: Wow, and I never thought of it like that! What's wrong with me? I gave up watching telly 2 years ago, there are more commercials than 'Film Breaks'.. I never thought I'd miss the BBC and their licence fee, I sure do now, I'd rather pay the fee than watch the same commercials, adverts and programmes all day. You don't know what you've got till it's gone...EH? Jxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Posts.Content: They should be first against the wall! Shoot em! Jxxxxxxxx

Posts.Content: You are Phuckin' Hilarious!!!!!!!! Keep up the good work! Luv Ya Jxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: communication

Posts.Content: It's normal. The chemo cocktail stays in your system for a while and for some reason seems to be worse after the treatments finish, maybe this is because we have now got time to think. It soon fades, just go with the flow for a while. Big Hug Jxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: So, if i'm done...

Posts.Content: Wave a daffodil about and shout "Yachydar"!!!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: Happy St. Davids' Day everyone!!!!!!!!!!!

Posts.Content: And it still hurts too much to touch or wear a fitted bra :(
Posts.Title: Breast still tender 1yr later after lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I took it really bad with radiation and had all these bloody creams to rub on whatever, Polysporin for the red stuff, special cream with steroids to go on the broken out bits, Man I felt like a jigsaw puzzle! I also has Atavan and Oxys from my doctor...........Pills help. Hugs to you Jxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Problems with radiation - need advice

Posts.Content: Hell woman......You should be writing books! This is so well done. Danielle Steele......Eat your heart out! Hugs jxxxxxxxxxx
